entry.string: Institution of Engineering and Technology Journals Plugin (CLOCKSS)
"Institution of Engineering and Technology Journals Plugin (CLOCKSS), Base URL %s, Journal ID %s, Volume %s", base_url, journal_id, volume_name

entry.list:
2,"^%sjs/sgm/issue_toc_headings_ahah.js$", base_url 1,"^https?://(%s|cdn[.]mathjax[.]org|code[.]jquery[.]com)/[^?]*\.(bmp|css|eot|gif|ico|jpe?g|js|png|svg|tif?f|ttf|woff)(\?([0-9]+|config=|v=).*)?$", url_host(base_url)
2,"^%scontent/(journals?|suppddata)/[0-9]{2}\.[0-9]{4}/%s\.[^?]+\?fmt=[^/&]+$", base_url, journal_id
2,"^%scontent/journals?/%s/%s/[^/]+/cite/", base_url, journal_id, volume_name
1,"^%scontent/journals?/%s/%s/", base_url, journal_id, volume_name 1,"^%sarticles/renderlist\.action\?fmt=ahah&items=.*", base_url
2,"^%scontent/journals?/[0-9]{2}\.[0-9]{4}/%s\.[^?]+\?term=.*&db=pubmed$", base_url, journal_id 1,"^%scontent/(journals?|suppddata)/[0-9]{2}\.[0-9]{4}/%s\.", base_url, journal_id
1,"^%scontent/[0-9]{2}\.[0-9]{4}/%s\.[^/]+\.(ufig|fig||tab|T)[A-Za-z0-9-]+$", base_url, journal_id
1,"^%sdeliver/fulltext/%s/%s/", base_url, journal_id, volume_name
1,"^%sdeliver/fulltext/supp", base_url
1,"^%sdocserver(/ahah)?/fulltext/%s/%s/", base_url, journal_id, volume_name
1,"^%sdocserver(/ahah)?/fulltext/supp", base_urls
